overview: The Plantera Seedling is a Master Mode-exclusive pet dropped by Plantera with a 1/4 (25%) chance. Upon use, it summons a Plantera Seedling pet.
It is not to be confused with the Mud Bud, which spawns a different pet and is instead sold by the Zoologist after defeating Plantera.
